rows.label: tlk500501_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, these are some pretty snazzy
fabrics you've got here.

rows.label: tlk500501_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, are you interested in my
wares, my dear?

rows.label: tlk500501_msg0003
rows.name:
Mmmmm...not exactly.
Just thought they looked kind of cool.

rows.label: tlk500501_msg0004
rows.name:
To hear young people admire my
works is what makes all the trouble
of weaving them worthwhile!

rows.label: tlk500501_msg0005
rows.name: Are these hard to make, then?

rows.label: tlk500501_msg0006
rows.name: Would you like to try your hand at it?

rows.label: tlk500501_msg0007
rows.name:
I was just thinking, you've got a pretty
nice style going, but they're not quite
up to the standards I'm really after.

rows.label: tlk500501_msg0009
rows.name:
That does it, I'm teaching you.
Drop by my house whenever you
have the time, you hear?

rows.label: tlk500501_msg0011
rows.name:
Well, looks like I'm going to try
my hand at a spot of weaving.

rows.label: tlk500501_msg0021
rows.name:
I wouldn't have pegged you as
a weaver. But it could be fun!

rows.label: tlk500501_msg0022
rows.name:
You're pretty into cute clothes
and stuff, huh? Well, good luck!

rows.label: tlk500501_msg0023
rows.name:
Tora suddenly have power of foresight.
See Mei epic fail at weaving.
Mei get mad and snap loom in half.

rows.label: tlk500501_msg0024
rows.name:
That sounds like a rewarding hobby.
I'm sure you will be able to create
something quite remarkable.

rows.label: tlk500501_msg0025
rows.name:
You've got tons of fashion sense.
I bet you'll be great at it!
